timeline.bodyText: Optional: We should try to replace all testing Threads like these with use of ExecutorServiceRule. Spinning up our own Thread should be considered deprecated and replaced with Executors. The ExecutorServiceRule will report a failure if any thread is left running after the test or if any of these threads threw anything.
